summary: Halley's Comet  is a comet which comes round every 75 or 76 years.
full_text: Fred Lawrence Whipple  was an American astronomer, who worked at the Harvard College Observatory for over 70 years. Amongst his achievements, he discovered some asteroids and comets, came up with the "dirty snowball" cometary hypothesis, and designed the Whipple shield.
title: Fred Whipple
